QuestData.Title: Eagle Egg Recovery
QuestData.Description:
Eagles are revered by the Skyhorn tribe, but their numbers are dwindling.
The drogbar feed their fledgling worms eagle eggs so they'll grow strong enough to ride into battle.
If the drogbar continue to pilfer these eggs, the eagles may become extinct.
Head deeper into the cave and recover any eagle eggs you can find.
QuestData.LogDescription: Head into Rockcrawler Chasm and recover eagle eggs.
